data.what_is:
Blendee
The First European M.O.S.
Engage Your Perfect Audience. Enjoy The Experience. Elevate Your Business

Blendee is the first European Marketing Operating System (M.O.S.), a technological solution that arises from the evolution of the more traditional marketing and advertising technologies.

Blendee combines the functions of a modern Customer Data Platform, an Ad Server and a performing DMP (Audience Management Platform).
Blendee is an end-to-end solution which allows to orchestrate and to oversee the entire customer journey of each individual user.

From the first impression on paid channels to engagement and retention activities, Blendee allows users to personalize the customer experience in every touchpoint, managing all marketing activities from a single platform.
data.product_description: Blendee is a cloud an A.I. marketing automation platform, designed to help eCommerce and lead generation websites to boost sales.

initial_reviews.review_title: Client using Adabra was very satisfied
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Blendee?
Very easy to use. User interface allowed quick assessment of data and trends.

What do you dislike about Blendee?
I was based in US working with Italian clients and a more global platform could have been beneficial at times.

What problems is Blendee solving and how is that benefiting you?
Managing multiple marketing campaigns simultaneously.
